properties.entry: SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,TITLE_IMG ,LIKECOUNT ,ROWNUM FROM (SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,FILE_PATH || '/' ||CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLE_IMG" ,LIKECOUNT FROM TB_PLACE P JOIN TB_FILE F ON (P.PLACE_NO = F.REF_NO) WHERE F.FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY LIKECOUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT PLACE_NO ,PLACE_TITLE ,CATEGORY_NO ,WRITER ,LOCATION_NO ,MAKE_DATE ,P.STATUS ,PHONE ,ADDRESS ,PLACE_CONTENT ,START_TIME ,END_TIME ,STAR_POINT ,PLACE_URL ,VIEW_COUNT ,USE_TIME ,USE_PRICE ,BEST_STATUS ,FILE_PATH || '/' ||CHANGE_NAME "TITLEIMG" ,LIKECOUNT FROM TB_PLACE P JOIN TB_FILE F ON ( REF_NO = PLACE_NO ) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P.STATUS = 'Y' AND PLACE_NO = ?
